SAP PP Interview Questions,কজেন্ট,"",TK. 358,https://rokomari.com//book/54631/sap-pp-interview-questions,https://ds.rokomari.store/rokomari110/ProductNew20190903/130X186/18ef749a7_54631.jpg,"Book Summary of SAP PP Interview Questions

The goal of an interview is to try and gauge the amount of knowledge expertise of the candidate on a particular subject. This is done to evaluate the extent to which he/she can contribute towards a company's development. Even after years of training certification, and experience in executing various projects (implementation/roll outs/ support), there is a possibility of missing some question during the interview. This treatise, SAP PP Interview Question, is designed to prepare you for such questions. It is highly recommended for learners and technical, functional as well as techno-functional professionals. This book aims to cover all the concepts related to production planning in relation with SAP. An attempt has been made to cover all the concepts related to Master data, MRP, demand management, SOP, and other important aspects of SAP PP.
